thread.title: A Very Serious Investigation Into Where The Hell Kim And Kanye Are
thread.title_full: A Very Serious Investigation Into Where The Hell Kim And Kanye Are

author: Sylvia Obell
title: A Very Serious Investigation Into Where The Hell Kim And Kanye Are
text:
View this image ›
Instagram / Via instagram.com ID: 10314794 3. Even I couldn’t help but make a joke about the mystery on Twitter. And after it went viral, I learned that many people were actually really curious about it. View this image ›
Twitter / Via Twitter: @SylviaObell Like, hundreds of thousands of people.
ID: 10315435 4. So, I decided to look into one of the responses that made the most sense. View this image ›
Twitter / Via Twitter: @SylviaObell ID: 10315460 5. And after some very deep research, it seems evident that the house does belong to Def Jam founder and legendary producer Rick Rubin. View this image ›
Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images Which makes a lot of sense, as he and Kanye are longtime collaborators.
ID: 10314878 6. Let’s begin with Exhibit A: BBC Radio 1’s tour of Rubin’s Shangri-La recording studio in Malibu in 2014. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=0XetG_YqjTw . youtube.com ID: 10316120 7. The interior looks just like the backgrounds in Kim’s photos. Exhibit B: This screengrab of Rubin’s living room… View this image ›
BBC / Via youtube.com ID: 10314631 8. The only difference between that screengrab and Kim’s photo is the new furniture, which makes sense since the video is about three years old. View this image ›
Instagram / Via instagram.com ID: 10315063 9. Exhibit C: Rubin’s kitchen also looks exactly like the one in which Kanye was pictured eating. The pink backsplash, the blue line, the scalloped cabinets, and the window above the sink are all the same. View this image ›
Instagram / BBC / Via youtube.com ID: 10315100 10. Exhibit D: This photo of Rubin and company in his backyard provides another angle of the home studio. The wooden patio looks just like the one the Wests took this family photo on. View this image ›
Instagram / Via instagram.com ID: 10314633 11. And, Exhibit E: The French doors are identical to the ones where Kanye inspected Kim’s curves . View this image ›
Instagram / BBC / Via youtube.com ID: 10314632 12. When reached for confirmation that the Wests were at Shangri-La, a representative for Rubin said, “I think it’s most appropriate for this to be answered by Kim or Kanye’s representatives.” But publicists for the couple did not reply to BuzzFeed News’ request. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10316054 13. Still, it seems very apparent that the Wests were not visiting distant relatives, or at their pool house, or at an Airbnb they booked for a photo shoot; they were just chilling at Uncle Rick’s house. View this image ›
Instagram / Via instagram.com ID: 10315520 14. Hopefully this means there’s some new music from Kanye on the way. View this image ›
Def Jam / Via giphy.com ID: 10315524 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
 More News About Kim Kardashian, Kanye West
